# Materials for Focus Groups in Rural Africa

- [ ] Laminated photos of relevant species
- [ ] Laminated photos of relevant livelihoods
- [ ] Sticky notes (500)
- [ ] Pencils (50)
- [ ] Pens (50)
- [ ] Markers (100)
- [ ] Flip charts (5)
- [ ] Notebooks (5)
- [ ] Clothes pins (300)
- [ ] Audio recorder (2)
- [ ] Smartphone (2)
- [ ] Ruler (5)
- [ ] Tape measure (3)
- [ ] Glue sticks (5)
- [ ] Super glue (5)
- [ ] Tape (5 rolls)
- [ ] Thumb tacks (200)
- [ ] Velcro roll (1)
- [ ] Notecards (500)
- [ ] Scissors (3)
- [ ] String (clothesline) (100m)
- [ ] White paper packs (3)
- [ ] Colored pencils (200)
- [ ] Coloring books (20)
- [ ] Snacks
- [ ] Drinks
- [ ] Gifts
- [ ] Translation dictionary
- [ ] Outline
- [ ] IRB
- [ ] Permits
- [ ] Permission from traditional authority
